# Changes in 2.12.2

- Fix melter being accidentally disabled for certain games
- Load Victoria 3 mods from user directory in addition to Steam mods
- Update CK3 melter to 1.8
- Improve error handling for errors occurring during startup
- Fig various encoding issues for usernames with special characters
- Some small coat of arms renderer improvements to get closer to the in game results

# Changes in 2.12.1

- Fix coat of arms renderer variables not being resolved in the editor
- Fix external text editor not launching correctly in editor on Linux
- Fix various other small bugs
